#  STARS, BROWN DWARFS, AND GAS GIANT PLANETS COLORS
#  
#  E(B-V) =     0.000
#     A_V =     0.000
#
#  "MAGNITUDES" m AT THE STELLAR SURFACE
#  (distance modulus factor not included)
#
#  ABSOLUTE MAGNITUDES: M_m = m - 5logR(pc) + 5
#
# Type of calibration used: Vega
# Using recent Calspec Alpha Lyrea STIS spectrum:
# ftp://ftp.stsci.edu/cdbs/current_calspec/
#
# Uses Castelli/Kurucz models built into pysynphot ([M/H] = -1.5)
#
# Unless mentioned otherwise below, we calculate:
# Pogson magnitudes resulting from photon count integration (caracteristic of CCDs)
#
# HST ACS F606W F814W F435W F475W F555W WFC3
#
#        Teff    Logg   [M/H]   [a/H]        F606W        F814W        F435W        F475W        F555W        F225W        F275W        F336W        F390W
